title: 关于多世界连接地狱的命令
txt_content:
多世界连接地狱的命令 /mw link [目标地狱] [世界名] - 连接[目标世界]地狱和[世界名] 无法使用 
会提示 
Unable to acces portal handler addon, is it enabl
d inside the configuration?

[backcolor=rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)]an internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command

replies.author: 风女i
replies.txt_content:
an internal error occurred while attempting to perform this command 
这是插件不兼容吧

replies.author: yjfs
replies.txt_content:
确认一下插件设置文件里面
useportalhandler
是否设置为true了
